short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TimeBlock blocks distracting websites during specified hours, boosting productivity and focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TimeBlock is a powerful browser extension designed to help you stay focused and productive by blocking distracting websites during specified hours. Set your preferred time range, and TimeBlock will automatically prevent access to sites like social media, streaming platforms, and games during those hours. Stay on track with your tasks and boost your productivity with TimeBlock!
